basics.name: Mariah Vicary
basics.label: Front-end Developer
basics.summary: I live on an island in the pacific northwest of america.  When Iâ€™m not out exploring or dancing, I like to design user experiences! I aim to incorporate calming natural textures into efficient, functional websites.

work.summary: In 2018 58% of all web traffic came from mobile phones, and that number raises significantly for certain sites, such as restruant menus, every website I make prioritzes small screen interaction and also scales up beautifully (try my profile on any device!), Not only will it look great on a mobile phones, it will also ook amazing on bigger screens.

It's important to me to make a visitor to your website feel like they are part of an experience rather than just viewing a static page of information.  I strive to use animations and transitions to make web interaction more dynamic and therfore more enjoyable, stress free and memorable for any technical skill level.
I am so good at communicating!!! I promise :ohp:
Lorem ipsum about how I can quickly deliver a product. Maybe say something convincing like that I only work on one project at a time.......

There is no reason why your webpage shouldn't be a fun experience.  Efficiency in some areas needs to be maintained but if a user interacting with your website feels engaged and entertained they are more likely to stay for longer and possibly come back again for more

The internet is cluttered with excess information users get overwhelmed visualy and have no choice but to shut out most of the input.  I try to make my websites a break from the bussiness of the web and our lives.  Where information is presented as needed in a calm attractive fasion, taylored towards the end goal, on any screen size

sites.title: Healthy Harvest Nutrition App
sites.infoText1: Produce that's in season is cheaper, more nutritous, tastes better, and has a lower carbon footprint!
sites.infoText2: Bookmark this app on your home  screen for quick  reference  next time you're on a Fruit & Veg run!
sites.nerds: Here are a bunch of technologies that I used and demonsteate in this app, including but not limited to greensock (overkill) routes, nuxt, responsive grid layout

sites.title: Parallax and photo blog
sites.infoText1: My version of a couple of popular website styles! Based on vuetify themes, but with my own personal touch! The first is an attractive 3d scrolling effect called PARALLAX scrolling, parallax is especially popular for mobile site, but looks great on all devices
sites.infoText2: Second we have a photo blog, showcasing a mosaic photo format and filled with some of my favorite captures from this year

sites.title: Material design discography app
sites.infoText1: Search for your artist and see their top albums displayed
sites.infoText2: Featuring a star rating system and links to purchase the album and here song previews through itunes!
